block.p: AMERICAN URBAN NETWORKS, -- New York, named Vernon S. Wright, vice president and general manager for SFX Radio Networks, as senior vice president for marketing and sales.
CIENA CORP., -- Linthicum, Md., named Claude Achcar, Asia Pacific group director at Nortel Networks, vice president for Asia.

FRONTLINE CAPITAL GROUP, -- New York, named Eileen Serra, senior vice president and general manager of financial services at American Express Co.'s small-business division, as chief operating officer.
MASTERCARD INTERNATIONAL, -- Purchase, N.Y., named Noah J. Hanft, senior vice president and deputy general counsel, as general counsel and corporate secretary. He will succeed Robert Norton.
